attributes.action: Keep schools open through any future lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: Children have missed out on enough of their education already. School is crucial for not only their education but their mental health.
attributes.background: Make sure the government doesn’t give in to pressure to shut the schools. Keep them open, children need their education. Schools should only be shut as a last resort if there are active cases or areas that have a high infection rate.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
